description: Defines data models for a pickleball court booking system, specifically the classes Slot and Court with serialization methods.

classes.name: Slot
classes.description: Represents a time slot for a court, including start/end times and capacity info.

classes.name: Court
classes.description: Represents a pickleball court with details such as id, name, surface, location, and available slots.

methods.name: Slot.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a Slot instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: Slot.toJson
methods.description: Serializes a Slot instance to a JSON map.

methods.name: Court.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a Court instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: Court.toJson
methods.description: Serializes a Court instance to a JSON map.
